item.title: KOS
item.description: score:126 Chances: Kosmos Energy Ltd. has successfully priced a private offering of $350 million aggregate principal amount of its 3.125% convertible senior notes due 2030, representing a $50 million increase in principal amount from the previously announced offering size. The company’s assets include production offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, the U.
